Supplementary Appendix Ã¢â¬â For Online Publication Additional references The Denkmaltopographie Bundesrepublik Deutschland cited in the main text (Dellwing 1988/2011) was preceded by separate series of volumes listing and describing all historical buildings in the single states of Germany. We looked up sizes of church buildings in these volumes as well, to extend and complement the analysis based on the Denkmaltopographie Bundesrepublik Deutschland.
